availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Egbert G. Cole (Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter, lumber merchant, and saw miller)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, carpenter, lumber merchant, and saw miller. Native of Canada. Married to Lucilla Davis Cole in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on June 7, 1846. Father of Merrill Cole, Levi Cole, and Ida Cole. Carpenter in Louisville in 1850. Lumber merchant in Louisville in 1860. Saw miller in partnership with James White in White & Cole in Louisville in 1858 through 1863.
